data.prayer: Lord, make the 5,605 believers in Wakayama to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 984,395 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wakayama, Japan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 984,395 lost in Wakayama that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary: On average, 116 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Wakayama, Japan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Wakayama, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Wakayama, Japan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Eurasian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
There are 990,000 people living in the state of Wakayama. Only about 5,605 might be believers.
Spirit, help every believer in Wakayama, Japan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Wakayama.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

location.name: Wakayama
location.people_groups_list: Turk, Kikai, Thai, Malay, Miyako, Ryukyuan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Turk (4,900), Kikai (13,000), Thai (9,900), Malay (9,900), Miyako, Ryukyuan (66,000)
